-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | dimensional-tf wrapper on atmos package
--   
--   1976 US Standard Atmosphere with dimensions from dimensional-tf
--   package.
--   
--   This is a thin wrapper on top of the atmos package.
--   
--   I recommend using the atmos-dimensional package instead of this until
--   atmos-dimensional-tf is more stable.
@package atmos-dimensional-tf
@version 0.1.2

module Atmosphere.Dimensional.TF
data Atmos a
Atmos :: ThermodynamicTemperature a -> Pressure a -> Density a -> Velocity a -> DynamicViscosity a -> KinematicViscosity a -> Atmos a
atmosTemperature :: Atmos a -> ThermodynamicTemperature a
atmosPressure :: Atmos a -> Pressure a
atmosDensity :: Atmos a -> Density a
atmosSpeedOfSound :: Atmos a -> Velocity a
atmosViscosity :: Atmos a -> DynamicViscosity a
atmosKinematicViscosity :: Atmos a -> KinematicViscosity a
atmosphere :: (Floating a, Ord a) => Length a -> Atmos a
